bibl.title: Lamps from the Sacred Animal Necropolis, North Saqqara and the Monastery of Apa Antinos. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Excavations of the Egypt Exploration Society, 1964-1976. - 33 lamps (from the Ptolemaic to the medieval period, with some perhaps as late as Mamluke times).
BAILEY Donald M., Lamps from the Sacred Animal Necropolis, North Saqqara and the Monastery of Apa Antinos. Avec résumé en anglais.
